root_causes.description: Lack of real-time inventory synchronization between cart and inventory service
Cart operations not optimized for concurrent user access
Missing validation for cart item quantity limits

contributing_factors: Insufficient error handling in cart update operations
Missing audit trail for cart modifications

lld_gaps.title: Missing Cart State Management Design
lld_gaps.description: LLD does not specify how cart state transitions (active, abandoned, converted) are managed
lld_gaps.recommendation: Add detailed state machine diagram and transition rules

lld_gaps.title: Incomplete Concurrency Control Specification
lld_gaps.description: No details on handling simultaneous cart updates from multiple devices
lld_gaps.recommendation: Define optimistic locking strategy and conflict resolution

lld_gaps.title: Missing Cart Persistence Strategy
lld_gaps.description: LLD lacks specification for cart data retention and cleanup policies
lld_gaps.recommendation: Document cart lifecycle, TTL policies, and archival strategy

lld_gaps.title: Insufficient Error Handling Documentation
lld_gaps.description: Error scenarios and recovery mechanisms not fully documented
lld_gaps.recommendation: Add comprehensive error handling flows and fallback mechanisms

recommendations.action: Implement real-time inventory validation before cart operations
Add distributed locking mechanism for cart updates
Design and implement cart lifecycle management
